params.name: Patch Size
params.tooltip: Patch size for prediction [Z, Y, X]. If null, will be auto-computed. Example: [80, 160, 160]

params.name: Patch Halo
params.tooltip: Halo size for patches [Z, Y, X]. If null, will be auto-computed. Example: [8, 16, 16]

params.name: Single Batch Mode
params.tooltip: Whether to process patches one at a time to reduce memory usage.

params.name: Model Update
params.tooltip: Whether to check for and download model updates.

params.name: Disable Progress Bar
params.tooltip: Whether to disable the progress bar during prediction.

params.name: Watershed Threshold
params.tooltip: Threshold for watershed segmentation. Higher values create fewer, larger segments.

params.name: Watershed Sigma Seeds
params.tooltip: Sigma for Gaussian smoothing of seeds in watershed.

params.name: Watershed Stacked
params.tooltip: Whether to apply watershed slice-by-slice (2D) instead of in 3D.

params.name: Watershed Sigma Weights
params.tooltip: Sigma for Gaussian smoothing of boundary map weights in watershed.

params.name: Watershed Min Size
params.tooltip: Minimum size (in voxels) for watershed superpixels. Smaller regions will be removed.

params.name: Watershed Alpha
params.tooltip: Alpha parameter for distance transform watershed.

params.name: Watershed Pixel Pitch
params.tooltip: Pixel pitch for anisotropic data [Z, Y, X]. If null, assumes isotropic.

params.name: Watershed Non-Max Suppression
params.tooltip: Whether to apply non-maximum suppression in watershed.

params.name: GASP Beta
params.tooltip: Beta parameter for GASP segmentation. Controls merging aggressiveness.

params.name: GASP Post Min Size
params.tooltip: Minimum size (in voxels) for final segments after GASP. Smaller regions will be merged.

params.name: Number of Threads
params.tooltip: Number of threads to use for watershed and GASP segmentation.

params.name: Voxel Size
params.tooltip: Voxel size [Z, Y, X] for saving TIFF metadata. Example: [1.0, 0.5, 0.5]
